The Ming Dynasty was the most prosperous eras of China. One of the reasons was due to the invention of woodblock color printing, paper, and the two-color printing process. It surpasses all the preceded printing techniques of the previous dynasties. Woodblock carving and wood movable type were enhanced to perfection. These are just few of the great inventions of Ming dynasty which swept through the ages all over the world. These contributions are up to now widely used, leaving a lasting mark not only in the history of China but of the world.
